content: this legal text summarizes a court case regarding the dissolution of a community property owned by several parties the property in question is a residential unit with accessory rooms located in agrate brianza the courtappointed consultant has determined that the property cannot be divided due to its size and construction type therefore the court has ordered the sale of the property the proceeds from the sale will be distributed among the coowners according to their respective shares the court of monza has made a final decision to dissolve a community property owned by two individuals the property is a residential unit with additional rooms located on the ground and first floor it has a commercial area of 38 square meters on the ground floor and a residential area of 17 square meters the court declares that the property can be divided into separate portions for sale this decision was made on may 31 2013 and officially recorded on june 11 2013
